about_the_game:
Drunk Driver is an endless side scroller where you try to see how far you can go without crashing. Find powerups during your run to assist in your survival and build your reaction speed as the difficulty increases.

Features
Powerups
Find different powerups throughout your run to help you gain that extra distance such as shrinking in size or blocking a hit

Perks
Collect perks throughout your run to boost the effectiveness of your power ups and hinder enemies

Enemies
Try to dodge different enemy types such as large trucks or small sports cars that block portions of the road for a while. Watch from behind as well for police that may chase you down

Skins
Use points earned during your run to purchase new cosmetic only skins.


Drunk Driver was a passion project of mine and is inspired off of an earlier version of it I made on Scratch when I was younger. and whilst there are lots of differences between the two such as aesthetic, and enemies, I have tried to keep the core gameplay the same.


As much as I hope this isn't necessary, I don't have to much faith
Obviously, this is just a game, and games don't have a major effect on peoples lives. Do not try and drive under the influence in real life.

short_description: Strive to survive in this endless side scroller as your drunken driver tries to see how far they can go. Avoid crashing into the other drivers in your way and avoid capture by the police using powerups and upgrades collected throughout your run to enhance your experience.
